QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: CIM_InstIndication is an abstract superclass describing changes to instances. Subclasses represent specific types of change notifications, such as instance creation, deletion and modification.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: A copy of the instance that changed to generate the Indication. SourceInstance contains the current values of the properties selected by the Indication Filter's Query. In the case of CIM_InstDeletion, the property values are copied before the instance is deleted.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The Model Path of the SourceInstance. The following format MUST be used to encode the Model Path: <NamespacePath>:<ClassName>.<Prop1>="<Value1>", <Prop2>="<Value2>", ...

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The host name or IP address of the SourceInstance.
